segments.text: What are you and Corey doing for Valentine ’ s Day this Friday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to do something romantic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Romantic ? I can ’ t remember what that word means .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you have three kids , so you knew what it meant once upon a time !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha , ha ! Those days are long gone .
segments.speaker: S2
